sentences.english: Mother is strict with her son.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈对她的女子很峻厉。

sentences.english: On hearing the news, the boss gave a dressing down to all those clerks that were involved in the business.
sentences.chinese: 老板听到阿谁动静后峻厉训斥了介入此事的人员。

sentences.english: After all, the two are in love and serious about getting married.
sentences.chinese: 事真那两小我相爱，对峻厉看待婚姻。

sentences.english: "peter, " he sternly admonished peter, his student.
sentences.chinese: “彼得，”他峻厉地训诫他的学生彼得道。

sentences.english: The death penalty is now in the world the severest one kind of penalty, is also called the capital punishment.
sentences.chinese: 死刑是当今世界上最为峻厉的一种科罚，又称为死刑。

sentences.english: We dare not play jokes on our teacher , because she is a serious person.
sentences.chinese: 我们不敢和教员开玩笑，因为她是个峻厉的人。

sentences.english: Opinions concerning strict parental discipline vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 针对峻厉的家教的观点迥然不同。

sentences.english: The annatto furniture production flow demand is very greatly lawless.
sentences.chinese: 红木家具的产流程要求十分峻厉。

sentences.english: On hearing the news. the owner gaudio-videoe a dressing down to dozens of clerks that were involved in the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 老板听到那个讯息后峻厉责备了参与此事的职员。

sentences.english: China to crack down on official partying to fight corrupt…
sentences.chinese: 中国拟采纳办法峻厉办法冲击糜烂下地官方宴会。
